title: Episode 114: Money on your Mind? Financial Psychology with Dr. Preston Cherry
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In this episode our hosts chat with Dr. Preston Cherry, the Founder and President of Concurrent Financial Planning , LLC, about the new and growing field of financial psychology. We discuss the importance of financial literacy and how financial decision-making might be impacted by personality traits and other psychological factors.  Dr. Cherry even shares some financial tips with us!

description: In this episode our hosts chat with Dr. Preston Cherry, the Founder and President of Concurrent Financial Planning , LLC, about the new and growing field of financial psychology. We discuss the importance of financial literacy and how financial decision-making might be impacted by personality traits and other psychological factors.  Dr. Cherry even shares some financial tips with us!
